golden_diagnosis: McCune-Albright 综合征/McCune-Albright syndrome; MAS/McCune-Albright syndrome/McCune-Albright syndrome, somatic, mosaic,McCune-Albright 综合征/McCune-Albright syndrome; MAS/McCune-Albright syndrome/McCune-Albright syndrome, somatic, mosaic,McCune-Albright 综合征/McCune-Albright syndrome; MAS/McCune-Albright syndrome/McCune-Albright syndrome, somatic, mosaic
predict_diagnosis:
1. McCune-Albright syndrome
2. Polyostotic fibrous dysplasia with precocious puberty
3. Gardner's syndrome
4. Cowden syndrome
5. Tuberous sclerosis complex (TSC)
6. Marfan syndrome
7. Ehlers-Danlos syndrome, hypermobility type
8. Ataxia telangiectasia
9. Lenz-Majewski syndrome
10. Mitochondrial disease, specifically those with bone involvement and endocrine dysfunction (e.g., POLG-related disorder)
